message: My turn! How about a slightly better deal for me this time?  We both know the value decreases each round.
Considering the value loss, let's meet closer to the middle.
Time is running out! This is a very fair offer considering the circumstances.
Let's be realistic about our losses, I've made a concession.
Okay, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to end this.
